languages.text: The Assassin attacks, granting +40% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the target of this attack. If this attack hits, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) damage increased by twice the percentage of that target's missing wounds.
languages.original_text: Совершая атаку, ассасин предоставляет цели +40% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}. Если атака достигает цели, она наносит +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} урона дополнительно (с округлением вниз). Этот прирост увеличивается на удвоенный процент недостающего здоровья цели. {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Летальность{/g}: особый показатель, который используется ассасином, равный уклонению или {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} — в зависимости от того, какое значение выше.

traits.locale_text: The Assassin attacks, granting +40% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the target of this attack. If this attack hits, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) damage increased by twice the percentage of that target's missing wounds.\n{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethality{/g}: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to dodge or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

The Assassin attacks and grants +40% dodge to the target for this attack. If this attack hits, it deals an additional +(lethality)/10 (rounded down) damage. If this attack hits an opening, its additional damage is increased by (lethality)%. Lethality: a specific Assassin's characteristic that is equal to dodge or dodge penetration, depending on which of those is higher.

The Assassin attacks, granting +40% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the target of this attack. If this attack hits, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) damage increased by twice the percentage of that target's missing wounds. {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethality{/g}: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to dodge or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

The Assassin {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} and grants +40% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} to the target for this attack. If this attack {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g}, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. If this attack hits an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, its additional damage is increased by {uip|DamageBonus|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3}%. Lethality: a specific Assassin's characteristic that is equal to dodge or dodge penetration, whichever is higher.

The Assassin attacks and grants +40% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the target for this attack. If this attack hits, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) damage, which is increased by twice the percentage of that target's missing wounds.\n{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethality{/g}: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to dodge or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

If this attack hits, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) damage, which is increased by twice the percentage of that target's missing wounds.\n{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethality{/g}: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to dodge or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

If this attack hits, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) damage, which is increased by twice the percentage of that target's missing wounds.\n{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethality{/g}: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to dodge or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

The Assassin attacks and grants +40% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the target for this attack. If this attack hits, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) damage, which is increased by twice the percentage of that target's missing wounds.\n{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethality{/g}: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to dodge or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

The Assassin attacks, granting +40% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the target of this attack. If this attack hits, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) damage increased by twice the percentage of that target's missing wounds. {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethality{/g}: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to dodge or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

languages.text: Совершая атаку, ассасин предоставляет цели +40% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}. Если атака достигает цели, она наносит +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} урона дополнительно (с округлением вниз). Этот прирост увеличивается на удвоенный процент недостающего здоровья цели.
languages.original_text: The Assassin attacks and grants +40% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} to the target for this attack. If this attack {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g}, it deals an additional +(lethality / 10) (rounded down) damage. If this attack hits an opening, its additional damage is increased by lethality%. Lethality: a specific Assassin's characteristic that is equal to dodge or dodge penetration, whichever is higher.

traits.locale_text: Совершая атаку, ассасин предоставляет цели +40% к уклонению. Если атака достигает цели, она наносит +(число уровней летальности / 10) урона дополнительно (с округлением вниз). Если атака попадает в слабое место, дополнительный урон увеличивается на число уровней летальности%. Летальность: особый показатель, который используется ассасином, равный уклонению или снижению уклонения – в зависимости от того, какое значение выше.

Совершая атаку, ассасин предоставляет цели +40% к уклонению. Если атака достигает цели, она наносит +(число уровней летальности / 10) урона дополнительно (с округлением вниз). Если атака попадает в слабое место, дополнительный урон увеличивается на число уровней летальности%. Летальность: особый показатель, который используется ассасином, равный уклонению или снижению уклонения – в зависимости от того, какое значение выше.

Совершая атаку, ассасин предоставляет цели +40% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g}. Если {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}атака{/g} достигает цели, она наносит +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} урона дополнительно (с округлением вниз). Если атака попадает в слабое место, дополнительный урон увеличивается на {uip|DamageBonus|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3}%. Летальность: особый показатель, который используется ассасином, равный уклонению или снижению уклонения – в зависимости от того, какое значение выше.

languages.text: 刺客攻击目标，目标敌人对此次攻击获得40%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}加值。如果本次攻击命中目标，则额外造成{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3}点伤害（向下取整）。造成的额外伤害会获得加成，等同于目标损失生命值百分比的两倍。
languages.original_text: The Assassin attacks, granting +40% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the target of this attack. If this attack hits, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) damage increased by twice the percentage of that target's missing wounds.

traits.locale_text: 刺客攻击目标，目标敌人对此次攻击获得40%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}加值。如果本次攻击命中目标，则额外造成{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3}点伤害（向下取整）。造成的额外伤害会获得加成，等同于目标损失生命值百分比的两倍。\n{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}：刺客的特殊属性，等同于闪避或{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避穿透{/g}两者较高值。

刺客攻击目标，目标敌人对此次攻击获得40%{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}加值。如果本次攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标，则额外造成{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3}点伤害（向下取整）。如果本次攻击命中破绽，则会额外造成伤害，伤害加值等同于{uip|DamageBonus|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3}的百分比。 致命：刺客的特殊属性，等同于闪避或闪避穿透两者较高值。

languages.text: El asesino ataca y otorga +40 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} a su objetivo. Si impacta, inflige +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (redondeando hacia abajo) de daño adicional, y este daño aumenta en el doble del porcentaje de las heridas infligidas al objetivo.
languages.original_text: The Assassin attacks, granting +40% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the target of this attack. If this attack hits, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) damage increased by twice the percentage of that target's missing wounds.

traits.locale_text: El asesino ataca y otorga +40 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} a su objetivo. Si impacta, inflige +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (redondeando hacia abajo) de daño adicional, y este daño aumenta en el doble del porcentaje de las heridas infligidas al objetivo.\n{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Letalidad{/g}: un parámetro específico de Asesino que es igual al valor mayor entre esquiva y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}.

El asesino ataca y concede un +40 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} al objetivo para este ataque. Si el ataque {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g}, inflige un daño adicional igual a +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3}, redondeando hacia abajo. Si el ataque impacta en una zona desprotegida, el daño adicional causado se incrementa en un porcentaje igual a la {uip|DamageBonus|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3}. Letalidad: característica exclusiva del asesino que equivale a su esquiva o a su penetración de esquiva, la que sea más alta.

languages.text: Der Assassine greift an und gewährt dem Ziel +40 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} gegen diesen Angriff. Wenn dieser Angriff trifft, verursacht er zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (abgerundet) Schaden, erhöht um das Doppelte des Prozentsatzes der fehlenden Wunden dieses Ziels.
languages.original_text: The Assassin attacks, granting +40% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the target of this attack. If this attack hits, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) damage increased by twice the percentage of that target's missing wounds.

traits.locale_text: Der Assassine greift an und gewährt dem Ziel +40 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} gegen diesen Angriff. Wenn dieser Angriff trifft, verursacht er zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (abgerundet) Schaden, erhöht um das Doppelte des Prozentsatzes der fehlenden Wunden dieses Ziels.\n{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethalität{/g}: ein spezieller Assassinen-Parameter, der dem Ausweichen-Wert oder der {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweich-Reduktion{/g} entspricht, je nachdem, was höher ist.

Der Assassine greift an und gewährt dem Ziel +40% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} für diesen Angriff. Wenn dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, verursacht er zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (abgerundet) Schaden. Wenn dieser Angriff eine Blöße trifft, wird sein zusätzlicher Schaden um {uip|DamageBonus|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3}% erhöht. Lethalität: eine spezielle Assassinen-Eigenschaft, die dem Wert für Ausweichen oder Ausweichdurchdringung entspricht; je nachdem, welcher höher ist.

Der Assassine greift an und gewährt dem Ziel +40 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} gegen diesen Angriff. Wenn dieser Angriff trifft, verursacht er zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (abgerundet) Schaden, erhöht um das Doppelte des Prozentsatzes der fehlenden Wunden dieses Ziels.\n{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethalität{/g}: ein spezieller Assassinen-Parameter, der dem Ausweichen-Wert oder der {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweich-Reduktion{/g} entspricht, je nachdem, was höher ist.

languages.text: L'assassin attaque et confère +40 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} à sa cible. S'il fait mouche, il lui inflige +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} points de dégâts supplémentaires (valeur arrondie au nombre entier inférieur), augmentés de deux fois le pourcentage des blessures manquantes de la cible.
languages.original_text: The Assassin attacks, granting +40% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the target of this attack. If this attack hits, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) damage increased by twice the percentage of that target's missing wounds.

traits.locale_text: L'assassin attaque et confère +40 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} à sa cible. S'il fait mouche, il lui inflige +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} points de dégâts supplémentaires (valeur arrondie au nombre entier inférieur), augmentés de deux fois le pourcentage des blessures manquantes de la cible.\n{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Létalité{/g} : caractéristique propre à l'assassin, égale à l'esquive ou à la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}, la valeur la plus élevée étant retenue.

L'Assassin attaque, ce qui confère +40 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} à la cible. Si cette attaque {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} la cible, elle lui inflige +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (valeur arrondie au nombre entier inférieur) points de dégâts supplémentaires. Si cette attaque touche une brèche, les dégâts supplémentaires qu'elle inflige augmentent en fonction du pourcentage de {uip|DamageBonus|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3}. Létalité : caractéristique propre à l'Assassin, égale à l'esquive ou à la pénétration d'esquive, selon la valeur la plus élevée.

L'assassin attaque et confère +40 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} à sa cible. S'il fait mouche, il lui inflige +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} points de dégâts supplémentaires (valeur arrondie au nombre entier inférieur), augmentés de deux fois le pourcentage des blessures manquantes de la cible.\n{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Létalité{/g} : caractéristique propre à l'assassin, égale à l'esquive ou à la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}, la valeur la plus élevée étant retenue.

languages.text: アサシンから攻撃を受ける場合、そのターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}力が40%増加する。この攻撃が命中したとき、削った体力の割合を2倍にした{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3}(切り捨て)のダメージを追加で与える。
languages.original_text: The Assassin attacks, granting +40% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the target of this attack. If this attack hits, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) damage increased by twice the percentage of that target's missing wounds.

traits.locale_text: アサシンから攻撃を受ける場合、そのターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}力が40%増加する。この攻撃が命中したとき、削った体力の割合を2倍にした{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3}(切り捨て)のダメージを追加で与える。\n{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}：アサシン特有のパラメーター。回避または{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}のうち、高い方の値と同じになる。

アサシンの攻撃は、この攻撃のターゲットに+40%の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}を与える。この攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}した場合、追加で+{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3}（切り捨て）のダメージを与える。この攻撃が隙に命中した場合、追加ダメージは{uip|DamageBonus|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3}%増加する。 致死率：アサシン特有のステータス。回避または回避貫通のうち、高い方の値に等しい。

languages.text: The Assassin attacks and grants +40% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the target for this attack. If this attack hits, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) damage, which is increased by double the percent of enemy's lost wounds. {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethality{/g}: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to dodge or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

traits.locale_text: The Assassin attacks and grants +40% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the target for this attack. If this attack hits, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) damage, which is increased by double the percent of enemy's lost wounds. {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethality{/g}: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to dodge or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

languages.text: Suikastçı, saldırdığında hedefe bu saldırı için +%40 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} kazandırır. Saldırı hedefe isabet ederse ilave +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (aşağı yuvarlanır) hasar verir. Bu hasar, hedefin eksik sağlık puanı yüzdesinin iki katı kadar artar.
languages.original_text: The Assassin attacks, granting +40% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the target of this attack. If this attack hits, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) damage increased by twice the percentage of that target's missing wounds.
